name: youlag
description: Youlag is a self-hosted latency and response tracking tool for services, visualizing delays and outages over time. It aims to provide quick, intuitive insight into user-perceived performance.
features: Latency monitoring: Measure response times for web services and APIs to identify performance degradation.
Visual dashboards: View latency trends over time with charts and graphs that highlight spikes and patterns.
Multi-endpoint tracking: Monitor multiple services simultaneously from a single dashboard for comprehensive oversight.
Alert thresholds: Set latency limits that trigger notifications when services exceed acceptable response times.
Historical data: Store and analyze past performance metrics to identify long-term trends and recurring issues.
Uptime tracking: Monitor service availability alongside latency to get a complete picture of reliability.
Geographic testing: Measure response times from different locations to understand regional performance variations.
Custom intervals: Configure how frequently each service is checked to balance accuracy with resource usage.
Status pages: Generate public or private status pages showing current and historical service performance.
Export reports: Download performance data in CSV or JSON format for external analysis and reporting.
Lightweight monitoring: Run checks with minimal overhead to avoid impacting the services being monitored.
Browser extension: Track latency directly from your browser to measure real user experience metrics.
